Welcome to Sygnet’s documentation!¶

Sygnet is a smart cryptographic tool created by Tokenika. It will enable you to use your banking account as a means to bootstrap your digital identity. We aim to make the process of proving who you are on the Internet as simple as authorizing a bank transfer.
